post.description: The authorization token is needed to perform any subsequent call to the IoTronic API. The user should provide her credentials in the body of the request specifying her username and password.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Credentials for authentication to the IoTronic API.

200.description: Authentication successfully performed: IoTronic replies with an authorization token also specifying its validity.

403.description: Authentication failed.

session_id.description: WAMP session id ('null' if the board is disconnected)

status.description: [ 'C' | 'D' ] specify if the board is connected or not

latest_update.description: timestamp of the latest board update

layout_id.description: Board layout ID [ 1 -> Arduino YUN | 2 -> generic server | 3 -> Raspberry Pi]

net_enabled.description: Flag [true | false] indicates if the board is VNET enabled

mobile.description: Flag [0 | 1] specifies if the board is mobile or not

notify.description: Flag [true | false] indicates if the notification system is enabled for this board

extra.description: User defined extra data in JSON format

timestamp.description: timestamp of the latest board position

403.description: Wrong, expired or not specified token in request header.

password.description: Board password: used only in 'password' authentication mode and if it is not specified Iotronic will generate a random password (alphanumeric 36 chars long).

pubkey.description: Board password: used only in 'certs' authentication mode and if it is not specified Iotronic return an error.

sensorslist.description: Sensor list id sensors comma separeted (e.g. 1,2,3,4, etc)

mobile.description: Flag [0 | 1] to specify if the board is mobile or not

position_refresh_time.description: [NOT USED YET] sending position rate in seconds

notify.description: Flag [true | false] to enable|disable notifications about the board

get.description:
It returns latest board position or its history: 
 - if no query parameters are specified this API returns the latest position known. 
 - if you specify 'samples' the API returns the latest number of samples specified. 
 - if you specify 'hours' or 'days' or 'weeks' you will obtain the samples number window specified.

parameters.name: samples
parameters.description: number of position samples to retieve.

post.summary: execute plugin operations on a board

parameters_set.description:
possible values:
 - 'default' (plugin will use DB input parameters specified at creation time)
 - 'latest' (plugin will use the last DB parameters injected)
 - 'new' (plugin will use the parameters specified in the field 'parameters' of this API, overwriting the 'latest' ones saved on DB).

operation.description:
possible values:
 - for 'async' plugins: 'run', 'kill'
 - for 'sync' plugins: 'call'
 - for both plugin types: 'restart'
